oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Lloyd Green - Nashville Cats program
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Lloyd Green Nashville Cats program held at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum's Ford Theater on February 18, 2006
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Lloyd Green; Bill Lloyd
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Musician Lloyd Green discusses his life and career. Interviewer is Bill Lloyd. Program contains interview, audio, audio from video and instrument demonstration. Green demonstrates his solos that he played on recordings of "The Bridge Washed Out" -- "D.I.V.O.R.C.E. -- "Jukebox Charlie". He also demonstrates his customizations made on his personal pedal steel guitar.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Green, Lloyd; Lloyd, Bill; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
